953280.name: Emirati Tales
953280.description:
Overview:

Dive into the world of Emirati Tales, a 3D educational platformer where players embark on an adventure through stories from Emirati folklore. The journey begins when a mystical book transports the player into a world filled with mythical creatures and challenges, each teaching important life lessons.

Key Features:

  • Engaging Storyline: Explore chapters from Emirati Tales, where each level introduces new characters and challenges, all tied to cultural stories and moral lessons.

  • Mythical Creatures: Meet creatures from Emirati folklore like Budaryah, the Napping Donkey, Umm Alduwais, and more, each with its own lesson to share.

  • Educational Content: The game shows how bad habits like greed and laziness affect individuals and those around them, using interactive storytelling to reveal their consequences and how to overcome them.

  • Diverse Environments: Journey through the desert, sea, and more, each filled with unique stories, challenges, and enemies, offering a new adventure at every level.

  • Adaptive Difficulty: The game adjusts to different play styles, making it suitable for all ages. Players can choose to rush through for a harder challenge or take their time and wait for the right moments, making the game easier to navigate.

  • Cultural Immersion: Experience the rich cultural heritage of the United Arab Emirates, bringing to life its folklore and traditions in a way that's accessible to children worldwide.

  • Family-Friendly Gaming: Perfect for players of all ages, providing a safe, engaging, and educational gaming experience that parents can appreciate and children will love.

  • Moral Lessons: Each level concludes with a valuable life lesson, aligning with the game's objective to foster good habits and moral understanding among its young audience.
